definition: jute (Corchorus capsularis Linn.)/plant fiber used for rope or sacks
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Which hatch does the shortage of the jute come out of?
sentences.chinese: 黄麻短卸是从哪个舱出来的？

sentences.english: Jute uprise is banner of brightness of one side of viatic of success of exploration China revolution.
sentences.chinese: 黄麻起义是探索中国革命成功道路的一面光辉旗帜。

sentences.english: Compared with jute and Brown linen, sisal carpets can be frequently used.
sentences.chinese: 与黄麻和棕麻相比，剑麻地毯可频繁使用。

sentences.english: It is uselessly laden with jute, and has been lying there idle for ever so long.
sentences.chinese: 它无用的载着黄麻，停靠在那儿已经很久了。

sentences.english: The characters of jute fibers, and its industrial development in recent years were presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黄麻的性能和近年来的产业发展情况。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the identification methods for Trema rientalis(L. ) BL.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立山黄麻生药鉴定的方法。

sentences.english: Huangma soil on the plain is the main cultivated soil on the Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 塬地黄麻土是黄土高原的主要土种。

sentences.english: As one of natural fibers, jute is grabbing more attention for its unique advantages.
sentences.chinese: 黄麻作为天然纤维的一种，其优势也正日益引起关注。

sentences.english: Jute detail lines midsole for a breezy finish.
sentences.chinese: 一个凉风习习的完成为底的黄麻详细线。

sentences.english: Rafael Benitez has poured scorn on speculation that Xabi Alonso could be offloaded to Real Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 拉法贝尼特斯对阿隆索可能转会去黄麻表示不屑一顾。

sentences.english: It is uselessly laden with jute, and has been idle for ever so long.
sentences.chinese: 船上装满了无用的黄麻，一直就闲置在那里。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer
